features: NAUSEA, MEET YOUR MATCH - We've all been there - scrolling on your phone during a car ride, only for sudden nausea to hit. But with Allclair by your side, unplanned motion sickness won't interrupt your moment. Perfect for those busy moments when you're on-the-go.

PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION - Whether you're embarking on a road trip, jet-setting by airplane, or on a cruise, Allclair is a must-add to your travel essentials and packing list. Conveniently travel-sized, it easily fits into purses or travel backpacks, ready to go for any spontaneous adventure.

NATURAL DRUG-FREE RELIEF - Our perfected aroma is crafted from a blend of natural herbs for an effective yet gentle aroma that doesn't linger. Allclair offers a non-medicated and non-drowsy alternative when you need immediate relief and don't want to take any medicine.

TAILORED TO YOUR NEEDS - For mild onset of nausea or queasiness, you can breathe in through the inhaler for quick and immediate relief. For a greater onset of discomfort, you can use the rub and apply some herbal oil on the tip of your nose for discreet, lasting relief.

SAFE TO USE ANYTIME - As a natural, non-medicated remedy, Allclair is ideal for mild onsets of nausea, motion sickness, dizziness, and morning sickness. Our herbal inhaler is crafted to be used as often as needed to provide you with relief from waves of discomfort.

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Natural drug-free relief for nausea and motion sickness that's non-medicated and doesn't make you sleepy. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Natural & Drug-Free Crafted from a blend of natural herbs to create a refreshing and balanced aroma perfected over 30 years. Perfect Travel Companion Designed to fit seamlessly into travel bags and purses to always be by your side and ready to go. Use Anytime Safe to use whenever you're feeling a bit queasy and need something to help regain your balance.

We never plan for nausea or motion sickness, it just happens. Allclair Herbal Inhaler provides fast, natural relief to mild onsets of nausea, and is your ideal travel companion, seamlessly fitting into your travel or daily essentials. From the bustling corridors of an airplane to the gentle sway of a cruise ship, motion sickness can catch you off guard. But with our compact, travel-sized herbal inhaler, you're prepared. Whether you're flying high or embarking on a spontaneous road trip, Allclair ensures nausea and motion sickness don't put a damper on your plans. Our drug-free natural remedy is crafted from a blend of herbal essential oils, our natural remedy is a must-have in every purse or travel bag. And because our inhaler is non-medicated and non-drowsy, you won't need to worry about taking any pills or feeling sleepy. So when it comes time to put together your packing list for that next trip, Allclair should be right at the top. Don't let nausea steal your moments. Regain control with Allclair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely not a gimmick
reviews.reviewText: I was a little hesitant but patches and wrist bands never worked for flying or on a cruise. When I felt a little bit of an upset stomach, just a couple inhales calmed it right down. I was amazed and very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the option to use it 2 ways, inhaler and rub on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Likely works but i can't stand the smell.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted this to work for me, but the scent makes me more nauseated. The minty smell reminds me of Orajel and Wintergreen Life Savers, which both make me queasy.This is definitely a me problem, but I wanted to share in case others have issues with the same smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help with motion sickness and nausea. It didn't work for us. The smell is great, it's easy to use, also easy for travel. The effectiveness wasn't there for us. I would probably not buy it again for motion sickness or nausea. It might be useful for a stuffy nose. Great idea, hope it's effective for others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little inhaler
reviews.reviewText: Refreshing and it will open up the nostrils. Just right to travel in your purse, love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sleek, cool color and super effective. Last for hours and you don’t need much. Great product.

reviews.reviewerName: The description and pictures shows it comes with two sticks but only received one. Half the packaging was missing, torn off on the dotted line.
